mapper.select: with sub as ( select mstr.POLL_ID, GROUP_CONCAT(mstr.QESITM_SN order by FRST_REGISTER_PNTTM asc separator ",") as QESITM_SN, sub.POLL_STATUS from survey.comtnbbspoolatdrn mstr left join survey.comtnbbspoolmanage sub on mstr.POLL_ID = sub.POLL_ID and mstr.USER_ID = sub.USER_ID where mstr.USER_ID = #{uniqId} group by mstr.POLL_ID ) select mstr.POLL_ID, case when sub.QESITM_SN is NULL then false else true end as status, mstr.POLL_BGNDE as startDate, mstr.POLL_ENDDE as endDate, case when sub.POLL_STATUS is null then 'todo' else sub.POLL_STATUS end as status, case when cast(mstr.POLL_ENDDE as date) < now() then true else false end expired from survey.comtnbbspoll mstr left join sub on mstr.POLL_ID = sub.POLL_ID where mstr.USE_AT = 'Y' order by mstr.POLL_ID

with sub as ( select mstr.POLL_ID, GROUP_CONCAT(mstr.QESITM_SN order by FRST_REGISTER_PNTTM asc separator ",") as QESITM_SN, GROUP_CONCAT(mstr.QESITM_ANSWER order by FRST_REGISTER_PNTTM asc separator ",") as QESITM_ANSWER, sub.QESITM_SN_LIST, sub.POLL_STATUS from survey.comtnbbspoolatdrn mstr left join survey.comtnbbspoolmanage sub on mstr.POLL_ID = sub.POLL_ID and mstr.USER_ID = sub.USER_ID where mstr.USER_ID = #{uniqId} and mstr.POLL_ID = #{pollId} group by mstr.POLL_ID ) select mstr.POLL_ID, mstr.POLL_NM, mstr.TEMP_SAVE as isSave, mstr.VOICE_SUP as isVoice, case when sub.POLL_STATUS is null then 'todo' else sub.POLL_STATUS end as status, sub.QESITM_SN, sub.QESITM_SN_LIST, sub.QESITM_ANSWER from survey.comtnbbspoll mstr left join sub on mstr.POLL_ID = sub.POLL_ID where mstr.USE_AT = 'Y' and mstr.POLL_ID = #{pollId}
select QESITM_SN, QESITM_SJ from survey.comtnbbspoolqesitm where POLL_ID = #{pollId}
select count(*) from survey.comtnbbspoolqesitm mstr where mstr.POLL_ID = #{pollId}
